name: joomla-jodit
description: Jodit is awesome and usefully wysiwyg editor with filebrowser

scripts.update: git submodule foreach git reset --hard HEAD && git submodule foreach  git pull origin master
scripts.github: npm run update && git add --all  && git commit -m "New version %npm_package_version%. Read more http://xdsoft.net/jodit/doc/index.html#%npm_package_version% " && git tag %npm_package_version% && git push --tags origin HEAD:master

author: Chupurnov <chupurnov@gmail.com> (http://xdsoft.net/)
